raw: Kinder Morgan cuts 2020 core profit outlook, spending on coronavirus hit .
replaced: The company cuts 2020 core profit outlook, spending on coronavirus hit .

raw: ( Reuters ) - U.S. pipeline operator Kinder Morgan Inc ( KMI.N ) on Wednesday reported a smaller - than - expected quarterly profit and cut its adjusted core earnings forecast for the year , following a coronavirus - induced decline in fuel demand and a crash in crude prices .
replaced: ( The company on Wednesday reported a smaller - than - expected quarterly profit and cut The company adjusted core earnings forecast for the year , following a coronavirus - induced decline in fuel demand and a crash in crude prices .

raw: Oil and gas pipeline and storage companies in the United States and Canada have slashed their budgets for the year as their customers wind down drilling activity in the face of dwindling demand and a price war between Saudi Arabia and Russia that has sent crude to its lowest in decades .

raw: “ Sharp declines in both commodity prices and refined product demand in the wake of the COVID-19 pandemic clearly affected our business and will continue to do so in the near term , ” Kinder Morgan President Kim Dang said .

raw: The company said it expects crude oil pricing for the rest of the year to average around $ 30 per barrel , down from its first - quarter realized price of $ 54.61 per barrel .
